bibl.note: Publishes one of two papyri acquired by the Rare Books Room of the University of Colorado Libraries. Memorandum consisting of a list of sundry items preceded by per‹ toË/t«n, some notation of expenditure (2nd hand) and a final injunction (3rd hand). Provenance unknown, 5th cent. A.D. - Pp. 215-218: Addendum on the Sa˝tion. The jar Sa˝tion is attested in 5 other papyri and in 8 various Byzantine texts. <peri tou / ton, Saïtion>
